|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367R-VB;RTL8367R, BJ712P7, GB47B; TAIWAN; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:0E:3B |oui = 00:0E:3B |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;3.5.3.0;Ralink; |stockos = Linux;2.6.21;; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.25 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2567L;SiGe, 2567L, 143AB;3; ,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;unknown;unknown;1047, NEA2;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = Hawking_HD45R_2.4GHz,Hawking_HD45R_5GHz |defaultssid_regex = ^Hawking_HD45R_2.4GHz$,,,^Hawking_HD45R_5GHz$ |default_ch = |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = BR-6675nD |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan ? |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/20/2011 |estreldate = 02/20/2012 |estprice = |upc = 603992507030 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B007B5PR1O |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT3092;RT3092L, TPBV93610, 1144ST; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *LAN: 4x 1GbE (Auto-MDI/MDI-X) *WAN: 1x 1GbE (Auto-MDI/MDI-X) *2.4GHz: 2T2R MIMO (300Mbps) *5GHz: 3T3R MIMO (450Mbps) *Antenna: 3x 3dBi DualBand Dipole *Power Adapter: 12V, 1.25A "1244-00000729-50Z" is silkscreened on one production model HD45R's board.
This device is an [[Edimax BR-6675nD]]. It's board is
somewhat similar to the one used by the [[Edimax BR-6475nD|BR-6475nD]]. Per the manual, this device has two SSIDs:
'''Hawking_HD45R_2.4GHz''' and '''Hawking_HD45R_5GHz'''. :There are a few entries (6) for the 2.4GHz SSID
in WiGLE as of 03/30/2013, all with 00:0E:3B OUIs. ==Links of Interest== [http://hawkingtech.com/products/downloadfile/771.html Datasheet]
[http://hawkingtech.com/products/downloadfile/901.html User's manual] ===Spec. aggregators=== *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/hawking-hd45r-hi-gain-dual-band-wireless-n-router-2453 On SpeedGuide.net] ===Vendors=== *[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833164054 On Newegg] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== It's presumably the following... 
(TxD) (GND) (RxD) [3.3]
J2
{{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
